resources.string: Hello, this is the new Netology! Netology once began with online marketing intensives. Then came courses in design, development, analytics and management. We grow ourselves and help students grow, from beginners to confident professionals. But the most important thing remains with us: we believe that everyone already has a power that makes you want more, aim higher, run faster.
